categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Boibole was a Human female soldier who served the Sith Empire on the Sith capital planet of Dromund Kaas where she sold specialist equipment.

Boibole appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Equipment Commendations Vendor for Imperial players on Dromund Kaas. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, she was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors.
